column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////After hearing so many good things about Jinya
column2: I was finally able to try it out
column3: but I'm sad to report that it did not live up to the hype. When we first arrived
column4: there was a lengthy line ahead of us
column5: and it took us 45 minutes to get seated. I will admit that the ambiance is very cool
column6: and the modern decorations put the room together nicely.
